A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After digesting this for 24 hours\, this movie is so disappointing.  Snoke is purely a meaningless Mcguffin  and Rey is revealed to be nothing more than a Mary Sue.  Seriously Disney?  I've grown up with these\, slept outside of theaters to see the movies on release nights in my youth.  How dare you disrespect the characters to this extent.  Betray the world building and lore.  \n\nAnd to the critics\, pull your heads out of your check books and stop taking kickbacks.  Justice League was a better film that this train wreck\, but it's professionally okay to rail on DC when you feel obligated to bow down to the house of mouse.
